title: Technology-Enhanced Learning Design for Fostering Higher-Order Thinking in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific disciplines and foundational digital literacy
context.additional_context: Implementation of a customized Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) environment to improve deep-thinking skills for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three critical analysis and evaluation strategies using technological tools for scientific problem-solving
Learners engage in structuring scientific debates and proposing creative solutions through real-time collaboration with at least 80% participation
Based on formative assessment feedback, learners reflect on their thinking processes and develop at least one improvement plan
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
